root.message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 8-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
Treatment of missing values:

  • At country level:

Multivariate regression techniques are used to impute missing employment values at the country level.

For a detailed description of the methodology used, please refer to Trends Econometric Models: A Review of Methodology (ILO, Geneva, 2010), available at http://www.ilo.org/empelm/pubs/WCMS_120382/lang--en/index.htm.

  • At regional and global levels:
